title: Blended Intercultural Awareness Experiential Teaching Design for Strengthening Higher Vocational English Reading Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level English reading comprehension and basic grasp of English grammar
context.additional_context: Cultivating practical reading skills through analysis of specialized English texts in science, integrating digital device-supported online-offline learning environments

learning_goals: Learners extract and summarize key concepts from science-related English texts with over 70% accuracy
Learners apply three English reading strategies considering cultural backgrounds to authentic texts
Learners conduct peer evaluation and feedback at least twice using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
